On Sat, Sep 16, 2017 at 8:40 PM, Yan Facai (颜发才) ***@***.***> wrote:
 What the type of conv? I mean, type(conv)?

 In [7]: np.count_nonzero([1, 0, 0])
 Out[7]: 1

 In [8]: np.count_nonzero([1, 0, 0] == 0)
 Out[8]: 0

 In [9]: np.count_nonzero(np.array([1, 0, 0]) == 0)
 Out[9]: 2

 —
